trans-unit.source: Do you really want to go back to Main Menu?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to go back to Main Menu?

trans-unit.source: You will loose your changes. Are you sure?
trans-unit.target: You will loose your changes. Are you sure?

trans-unit.source: Vladimír Berger, Mirka Smitková, members of the Mystical Awakening, members of the Respawned UK, Irushian, Spartackus, Almkaz, Fistfullobeer
trans-unit.target: Vladimír Berger, Mirka Smitková, members of the Mystical Awakening, members of the Respawned UK, Irushian, Spartackus, Almkaz, Fistfullobeer

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the save file?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete the save file?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to destroy this unit?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to destroy this unit?

trans-unit.source: Enemy is building the Dyson Sphere
trans-unit.target: Enemy is building the Dyson Sphere

trans-unit.source: Hostile ship is entering the system
trans-unit.target: Hostile ship is entering the system

trans-unit.source: Enemy ship is on the planet orbit
trans-unit.target: Enemy ship is on the planet orbit

trans-unit.source: Enemy is building the Dyson Sphere.
trans-unit.target: Enemy is building the Dyson Sphere.

trans-unit.source: Hostile ship is entering the system.
trans-unit.target: Hostile ship is entering the system.

trans-unit.source: Enemy ship entered orbit of the planet.
trans-unit.target: Enemy ship entered orbit of the planet.

trans-unit.source: Energy was salvaged from the wreckage.
trans-unit.target: Energy was salvaged from the wreckage.

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough of rare resource.
trans-unit.target: You don't have enough of rare resource.

trans-unit.source: You have made the first contact.
trans-unit.target: You have made the first contact.

trans-unit.source: Planet has an empty factory queue.
trans-unit.target: Planet has an empty factory queue.

trans-unit.source: Research progress was salvaged from the wreckage.
trans-unit.target: Research progress was salvaged from the wreckage.

trans-unit.source: Technology progress was salvaged from the wreckage.
trans-unit.target: Technology progress was salvaged from the wreckage.

trans-unit.source: A trade deal was auto renewed.
trans-unit.target: A trade deal was auto renewed.

trans-unit.source: A trade deal is about expire.
trans-unit.target: A trade deal is about expire.

trans-unit.source: Start the experiment with a chance
trans-unit.target: Start the experiment with a chance

trans-unit.source: The experiment failed. You have lost half of your progress.
trans-unit.target: The experiment failed. You have lost half of your progress.

trans-unit.source: The experiment was successful. You have acquired a new technology.
trans-unit.target: The experiment was successful. You have acquired a new technology.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to exit?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to exit?

trans-unit.source: The Colony Ship is designed for the planetary colonization. The ship itself is used up in the process. Construction will use 1 Population point of the planet.
trans-unit.target: The Colony Ship is designed for the planetary colonization. The ship itself is used up in the process. Construction will use 1 Population point of the planet.

trans-unit.source: The Miner is a stationary unit designed as a mining operation base.
trans-unit.target: The Miner is a stationary unit designed as a mining operation base.

trans-unit.source: The Builder is designed for construction of stationary units.
trans-unit.target: The Builder is designed for construction of stationary units.

trans-unit.source: The freighter class is a cargo ship designed to carry goods and resources.
trans-unit.target: The freighter class is a cargo ship designed to carry goods and resources.

trans-unit.source: The scout class is a light combat unit designed for exploration and hit-and-run combat.
trans-unit.target: The scout class is a light combat unit designed for exploration and hit-and-run combat.

trans-unit.source: The Dyson Sphere is a megastructure around the star. You have to be very close to the star to build it.
trans-unit.target: The Dyson Sphere is a megastructure around the star. You have to be very close to the star to build it.

trans-unit.source: The carrier class is a spaceship that serves as a combat operation base. It has a docking area which can be used to transport other ships.
trans-unit.target: The carrier class is a spaceship that serves as a combat operation base. It has a docking area which can be used to transport other ships.

trans-unit.source: The battleship class is a large armored spaceship with a strong hull and shields, but weak weapons.
trans-unit.target: The battleship class is a large armored spaceship with a strong hull and shields, but weak weapons.

trans-unit.source: The destroyer class is a spaceship with superior weapons, but a weaker hull and shields.
trans-unit.target: The destroyer class is a spaceship with superior weapons, but a weaker hull and shields.

trans-unit.source: The frigate class is a support spaceship with strong shields, but a weaker hull and weapons. It can recharge shields of other spaceships if they are close enough.
trans-unit.target: The frigate class is a support spaceship with strong shields, but a weaker hull and weapons. It can recharge shields of other spaceships if they are close enough.

trans-unit.source: Defense Tower is a stationary defense unit with a strong hull and weapons. There is a minimum distance between each tower or station in the system.
trans-unit.target: Defense Tower is a stationary defense unit with a strong hull and weapons. There is a minimum distance between each tower or station in the system.

trans-unit.source: The Station is a stationary unit designed for exploration support. There is a minimum distance between each tower or station in the system.
trans-unit.target: The Station is a stationary unit designed for exploration support. There is a minimum distance between each tower or station in the system.

trans-unit.source: You have to build the prerequisite first -
trans-unit.target: You have to build the prerequisite first -

trans-unit.source: You are not close enough to the star.
trans-unit.target: You are not close enough to the star.

trans-unit.source: Not enough distance from another static unit.
trans-unit.target: Not enough distance from another static unit.

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough Population on the planet.
trans-unit.target: You don't have enough Population on the planet.

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough Rare Resources.
trans-unit.target: You don't have enough Rare Resources.

trans-unit.source: The planet does not have any free construction slot.
trans-unit.target: The planet does not have any free construction slot.

trans-unit.source: You don't have the highest influence in this system.
trans-unit.target: You don't have the highest influence in this system.

trans-unit.source: You have reached the maximum number of Trade Units.
trans-unit.target: You have reached the maximum number of Trade Units.

trans-unit.source: You do not have any Colony Ship. Do you want to build one?
trans-unit.target: You do not have any Colony Ship. Do you want to build one?

trans-unit.source: Can't find a planet to build a colony ship.
trans-unit.target: Can't find a planet to build a colony ship.

trans-unit.source: Energy is your main currency. You need it to be able to buy starships and planet constructions and to keep everything running. You can get more energy by colonizing new planets and building energy constructions.
trans-unit.target: Energy is your main currency. You need it to be able to buy starships and planet constructions and to keep everything running. You can get more energy by colonizing new planets and building energy constructions.

trans-unit.source: Intelligence is your diplomacy currency. You need it to be able to use diplomatic actions (declare war, control borders etc.). It's generated based on your total population.
trans-unit.target: Intelligence is your diplomacy currency. You need it to be able to use diplomatic actions (declare war, control borders etc.). It's generated based on your total population.

trans-unit.source: Research is used to unlock new technologies. It's generated based on your total population. You can get more by building research or population constructions.
trans-unit.target: Research is used to unlock new technologies. It's generated based on your total population. You can get more by building research or population constructions.

trans-unit.source: This is a rare resource. Rare resources are used for building more advanced starships and planet constructions.
trans-unit.target: This is a rare resource. Rare resources are used for building more advanced starships and planet constructions.

trans-unit.source: You do not have available points in Weapons.
trans-unit.target: You do not have available points in Weapons.

trans-unit.source: You do not have enough points in Warp Energy.
trans-unit.target: You do not have enough points in Warp Energy.

trans-unit.source: You do not have available points in Engines.
trans-unit.target: You do not have available points in Engines.

trans-unit.source: You do not have available points in Sensors.
trans-unit.target: You do not have available points in Sensors.

trans-unit.source: There was an error while loading. Sorry for that.
trans-unit.target: There was an error while loading. Sorry for that.

trans-unit.source: This save is not compatible. You can't load it.
trans-unit.target: This save is not compatible. You can't load it.

trans-unit.source: Find a new star system in the galaxy. This is your first step in the exploration.
trans-unit.target: Find a new star system in the galaxy. This is your first step in the exploration.

trans-unit.source: Your scan did not detect anything interesting. False alarm.
trans-unit.target: Your scan did not detect anything interesting. False alarm.

trans-unit.source: Your scan detected very rare particle with kinetic energy greater than 1x10^18 eV. This will boost your technology progress.
trans-unit.target: Your scan detected very rare particle with kinetic energy greater than 1x10^18 eV. This will boost your technology progress.

trans-unit.source: We have found a region with very high amount of energy particles.
trans-unit.target: We have found a region with very high amount of energy particles.

trans-unit.source: We believe we have found a lost cargo and managed to extract a rare resource from it. Or was that someone else's trash?
trans-unit.target: We believe we have found a lost cargo and managed to extract a rare resource from it. Or was that someone else's trash?

trans-unit.source: Scan 3 planets to get more information about them. Use Mini Warp Jump to move closer to a planet.
trans-unit.target: Scan 3 planets to get more information about them. Use Mini Warp Jump to move closer to a planet.

trans-unit.source: Build a colony ship and colonize a planet. You can colonize only rocky planets on the beginning of the game. You need technologies to be able to colonize other types. Use Mini Warp Jump to move closer to a planet.
trans-unit.target: Build a colony ship and colonize a planet. You can colonize only rocky planets on the beginning of the game. You need technologies to be able to colonize other types. Use Mini Warp Jump to move closer to a planet.

trans-unit.source: Build a construction on your planet.
trans-unit.target: Build a construction on your planet.

trans-unit.source: Build a starship to protect your planet.
trans-unit.target: Build a starship to protect your planet.

trans-unit.source: Colonize over 25% of all planets to win.
trans-unit.target: Colonize over 25% of all planets to win.

trans-unit.source: Take over and colonize home planets of your opponents.
trans-unit.target: Take over and colonize home planets of your opponents.

trans-unit.source: Acquire all available technologies and build the Dyson Sphere.
trans-unit.target: Acquire all available technologies and build the Dyson Sphere.

trans-unit.source: You have found a space anomaly. Scan it to find out more.
trans-unit.target: You have found a space anomaly. Scan it to find out more.

trans-unit.source: A new mod has been created and activated. See the Management tab.
trans-unit.target: A new mod has been created and activated. See the Management tab.

trans-unit.source: A new mod has not been created. The folder already exists or could not be created.
trans-unit.target: A new mod has not been created. The folder already exists or could not be created.

trans-unit.source: This mod is incompatible with the current version of the game.
trans-unit.target: This mod is incompatible with the current version of the game.

trans-unit.source: Wrong folder name. Use only A-Z a-z 0-9 and underscore.
trans-unit.target: Wrong folder name. Use only A-Z a-z 0-9 and underscore.

trans-unit.source: Wrong version format. It must be a number.number format.
trans-unit.target: Wrong version format. It must be a number.number format.

trans-unit.source: There was an error while processing the last turn. The current session will be closed. Sorry for that.
trans-unit.target: There was an error while processing the last turn. The current session will be closed. Sorry for that.

trans-unit.source: Energy is a main income. It's used by production and on maintenance of constructions. The rest goes to energy storage of the player.
trans-unit.target: Energy is a main income. It's used by production and on maintenance of constructions. The rest goes to energy storage of the player.

trans-unit.source: Intelligence is your diplomacy currency. More population means more intelligence. Growth is based on a type of the planet.
trans-unit.target: Intelligence is your diplomacy currency. More population means more intelligence. Growth is based on a type of the planet.

trans-unit.source: Planet type is an important attribute. Based on the planet type you get more or less population, production, research and intelligence growth.
trans-unit.target: Planet type is an important attribute. Based on the planet type you get more or less population, production, research and intelligence growth.

trans-unit.source: Population is a main attribute of every planet. More population means more energy, production, research and intelligence. Growth is based on the food attribute and a type of the planet.
trans-unit.target: Population is a main attribute of every planet. More population means more energy, production, research and intelligence. Growth is based on the food attribute and a type of the planet.

trans-unit.source: Preference is a population growth modifier. Lower preference means slower population growth. Every race has different preferences.
trans-unit.target: Preference is a population growth modifier. Lower preference means slower population growth. Every race has different preferences.

trans-unit.source: Production is used for building starships and planet constructions. Production needs energy. More production means faster building. Growth is based on a type of the planet.
trans-unit.target: Production is used for building starships and planet constructions. Production needs energy. More production means faster building. Growth is based on a type of the planet.

trans-unit.source: Research is used to unlock new technologies. More population means more research. Growth is based on a type of the planet.
trans-unit.target: Research is used to unlock new technologies. More population means more research. Growth is based on a type of the planet.

trans-unit.source: Food is used by population. More food means faster growth.
trans-unit.target: Food is used by population. More food means faster growth.

trans-unit.source: Slots is a number of how many constructions you can build on the planet.
trans-unit.target: Slots is a number of how many constructions you can build on the planet.

trans-unit.source: You can not colonize the planet.
trans-unit.target: You can not colonize the planet.

trans-unit.source: You have low influence in the system. You can not colonize any planet here.
trans-unit.target: You have low influence in the system. You can not colonize any planet here.

trans-unit.source: There are planets available for colonization in this system:
trans-unit.target: There are planets available for colonization in this system:

trans-unit.source: The moment he was set at liberty, he looked up to the sky and down to the ground, and, stamping with his foot, in a contemplative mood, said, Eppur si muove, that is, still it moves, meaning the earth.
trans-unit.target: The moment he was set at liberty, he looked up to the sky and down to the ground, and, stamping with his foot, in a contemplative mood, said, Eppur si muove, that is, still it moves, meaning the earth.

trans-unit.source: Money, says the proverb, makes money. When you have a little, it is often easier to get more. The great difficulty is to get that little.
trans-unit.target: Money, says the proverb, makes money. When you have a little, it is often easier to get more. The great difficulty is to get that little.

trans-unit.source: The sea is only the embodiment of a supernatural and wonderful existence. It is nothing but love and emotion; it is the 'Living Infinite'...The globe began with sea, so to speak; and who knows if it will not end with it? In it is supreme tranquility.
trans-unit.target: The sea is only the embodiment of a supernatural and wonderful existence. It is nothing but love and emotion; it is the 'Living Infinite'...The globe began with sea, so to speak; and who knows if it will not end with it? In it is supreme tranquility.

trans-unit.source: What makes the desert beautiful, is that somewhere it hides a well.
trans-unit.target: What makes the desert beautiful, is that somewhere it hides a well.

trans-unit.source: Carrier-class military vessel with dock-able area.
trans-unit.target: Carrier-class military vessel with dock-able area.

trans-unit.source: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.
trans-unit.target: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.

trans-unit.source: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.
trans-unit.target: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.

trans-unit.source: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.
trans-unit.target: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.

trans-unit.source: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.
trans-unit.target: Dyson Sphere is mega structure around the star. All 4 parts are needed for construction.

trans-unit.source: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
trans-unit.target: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.

trans-unit.source: To understand a science it is necessary to know its history.
trans-unit.target: To understand a science it is necessary to know its history.

trans-unit.source: The language of experiment is more authoritative than any reasoning: facts can destroy our ratiocination, not vice versa.
trans-unit.target: The language of experiment is more authoritative than any reasoning: facts can destroy our ratiocination, not vice versa.

trans-unit.source: There is no royal road to geometry.
trans-unit.target: There is no royal road to geometry.

trans-unit.source: Give me the place to stand, and I shall move the earth.
trans-unit.target: Give me the place to stand, and I shall move the earth.

trans-unit.source: The ocean wave power is never ending source of energy, same like power of the stars.
trans-unit.target: The ocean wave power is never ending source of energy, same like power of the stars.

trans-unit.source: Press the Galaxy Map button or press the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Press the Galaxy Map button or press the TAB key.

trans-unit.source: The government view provides information about the colonized planets, player bonuses and the overall status of your state. You can rename the planet or set a construction Plan here.
trans-unit.target: The government view provides information about the colonized planets, player bonuses and the overall status of your state. You can rename the planet or set a construction Plan here.

trans-unit.source: The military view provides information about all military units, player bonuses and overall status of your armada. You can rename units here.
trans-unit.target: The military view provides information about all military units, player bonuses and overall status of your armada. You can rename units here.

trans-unit.source: When you are finished with your turn, click on the Next Turn button.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished with your turn, click on the Next Turn button.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Basic User Interface tutorial. This tutorial will show you all the information panels and views in the game. Let's start with the Galaxy View. You can see all the star systems and your units in the warp mode.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the Basic User Interface tutorial. This tutorial will show you all the information panels and views in the game. Let's start with the Galaxy View. You can see all the star systems and your units in the warp mode.

trans-unit.source: The Factory panel shows items, which you can build or buy. There are two types - planet constructions and units.
trans-unit.target: The Factory panel shows items, which you can build or buy. There are two types - planet constructions and units.

trans-unit.source: You can see the finished planet constructions in the Constructions panel. If you don't need one, you can remove it. Some constructions are race specific and can not be removed.
trans-unit.target: You can see the finished planet constructions in the Constructions panel. If you don't need one, you can remove it. Some constructions are race specific and can not be removed.

trans-unit.source: The status bar is the center for the player information. You can see the current turn number and how much Energy, Research and Intelligence you have. It also shows rare resources.
trans-unit.target: The status bar is the center for the player information. You can see the current turn number and how much Energy, Research and Intelligence you have. It also shows rare resources.

trans-unit.source: The Galaxy Overview has information about all your colonized planets and units.
trans-unit.target: The Galaxy Overview has information about all your colonized planets and units.

trans-unit.source: The minimap is a miniature version of the current map type (Galaxy or System). You can use the minimap to fast move to a given point by left-clicking on it.
trans-unit.target: The minimap is a miniature version of the current map type (Galaxy or System). You can use the minimap to fast move to a given point by left-clicking on it.

trans-unit.source: Select the Solar System by double left-clicking a star system tooltip in the galaxy view.
trans-unit.target: Select the Solar System by double left-clicking a star system tooltip in the galaxy view.

trans-unit.source: The Star System view is more detailed compared to the Galaxy view. You can see the star, planets and all the units in the system. You can use numbers 0-9 to quickly select a planet in the system.
trans-unit.target: The Star System view is more detailed compared to the Galaxy view. You can see the star, planets and all the units in the system. You can use numbers 0-9 to quickly select a planet in the system.

trans-unit.source: Select planet Earth by left-clicking on the planet in star system view or by pressing key 3.
trans-unit.target: Select planet Earth by left-clicking on the planet in star system view or by pressing key 3.

trans-unit.source: Every system body (asteroid, star or planet) has an information panel. The planet information panel shows the name, planet attributes and rare resources.
trans-unit.target: Every system body (asteroid, star or planet) has an information panel. The planet information panel shows the name, planet attributes and rare resources.

trans-unit.source: Each planet has an orbit that you can enter, but beware entering the orbit of a planet, which is not yours. It can be seen as a hostile act.
trans-unit.target: Each planet has an orbit that you can enter, but beware entering the orbit of a planet, which is not yours. It can be seen as a hostile act.

trans-unit.source: The research view provides information about available technologies.
trans-unit.target: The research view provides information about available technologies.

trans-unit.source: Select technology to research by left-clicking the technology icon.
trans-unit.target: Select technology to research by left-clicking the technology icon.

trans-unit.source: You can select more than one technology to be researched by allocating the progress pool (slider on each technology in the tree). Once you hit the 50% progress on any technology you can start an experiment for faster progress, but if you fail you will loose part of it.
trans-unit.target: You can select more than one technology to be researched by allocating the progress pool (slider on each technology in the tree). Once you hit the 50% progress on any technology you can start an experiment for faster progress, but if you fail you will loose part of it.

trans-unit.source: In the status bar menu you can find more information about your colonies, research and trade.
trans-unit.target: In the status bar menu you can find more information about your colonies, research and trade.

trans-unit.source: The trade view provides information about your trade routes. There are two types - domestic and global.
trans-unit.target: The trade view provides information about your trade routes. There are two types - domestic and global.

trans-unit.source: You can see your own units on the orbit around the planet. If the planet is yours, you can repair them.
trans-unit.target: You can see your own units on the orbit around the planet. If the planet is yours, you can repair them.

trans-unit.source: If you select your unit, you can see the unit information panel. It shows the name, available actions, attributes, rank and experience.
trans-unit.target: If you select your unit, you can see the unit information panel. It shows the name, available actions, attributes, rank and experience.

trans-unit.source: Every unit can get an upgrade after reaching a new rank. The upgrade panel shows a list of available unit upgrades based on the rank and type of the unit.
trans-unit.target: Every unit can get an upgrade after reaching a new rank. The upgrade panel shows a list of available unit upgrades based on the rank and type of the unit.

trans-unit.source: You can colonize the planet now. Use the Colonize unit action. Colonization takes 5 turns, so keep pressing the Next Turn button until it's done.
trans-unit.target: You can colonize the planet now. Use the Colonize unit action. Colonization takes 5 turns, so keep pressing the Next Turn button until it's done.

trans-unit.source: To be able to colonize a planet you need two things. You need technologies, which allows you to colonize specific planet types, and you need to build a Colony Ship.
trans-unit.target: To be able to colonize a planet you need two things. You need technologies, which allows you to colonize specific planet types, and you need to build a Colony Ship.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to use the Mini Jump unit action and how to colonize a new planet.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to use the Mini Jump unit action and how to colonize a new planet.

trans-unit.source: To start the colonization process, you have to move closer to the planet with the Colony Ship. Use the Mini Warp Jump which is useful for very quick moves in the star system. The destination for the Mini Warp Jump should be the position of the planet in the next turn, as the Mini Warp Jump takes one turn. Jump to Mercury.
trans-unit.target: To start the colonization process, you have to move closer to the planet with the Colony Ship. Use the Mini Warp Jump which is useful for very quick moves in the star system. The destination for the Mini Warp Jump should be the position of the planet in the next turn, as the Mini Warp Jump takes one turn. Jump to Mercury.

trans-unit.source: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.
trans-unit.target: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.

trans-unit.source: The Battleship is a large armored spaceship with a strong hull and shields, but weak weapons.
trans-unit.target: The Battleship is a large armored spaceship with a strong hull and shields, but weak weapons.

trans-unit.source: The Carrier is a spaceship that serves as a combat operation base. It has a docking area which can be used to transport other ships.
trans-unit.target: The Carrier is a spaceship that serves as a combat operation base. It has a docking area which can be used to transport other ships.

trans-unit.source: The Destroyer is a spaceship with superior weapons, but a weaker hull and shields. It is a heavy combat spaceship designed only for causing massive damage.
trans-unit.target: The Destroyer is a spaceship with superior weapons, but a weaker hull and shields. It is a heavy combat spaceship designed only for causing massive damage.

trans-unit.source: Enemy detected in the system. You can attack enemies by using the Attack unit action or by holding the right mouse button and releasing it on the target. Just make sure that you are in range. You can use left ALT key or right CTRL key to see the enemy status. Destroy the enemy!
trans-unit.target: Enemy detected in the system. You can attack enemies by using the Attack unit action or by holding the right mouse button and releasing it on the target. Just make sure that you are in range. You can use left ALT key or right CTRL key to see the enemy status. Destroy the enemy!

trans-unit.source: The Frigate is a support spaceship with strong shields, but a weaker hull and weapons. It can recharge shields of other spaceships if they are close enough.
trans-unit.target: The Frigate is a support spaceship with strong shields, but a weaker hull and weapons. It can recharge shields of other spaceships if they are close enough.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is all about combat and advanced unit actions.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is all about combat and advanced unit actions.

trans-unit.source: The Scout is a light combat unit designed for reconnaissance. It is useful in early game combat. It has weak weapons, hull and shields, but it is very fast in the warp mode.
trans-unit.target: The Scout is a light combat unit designed for reconnaissance. It is useful in early game combat. It has weak weapons, hull and shields, but it is very fast in the warp mode.

trans-unit.source: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.
trans-unit.target: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.

trans-unit.source: There are five types of combat units - Scout, Destroyer, Battleship, Frigate and Carrier. Each type is designed for a specific task.
trans-unit.target: There are five types of combat units - Scout, Destroyer, Battleship, Frigate and Carrier. Each type is designed for a specific task.

trans-unit.source: You can see available constructions in the Factory Items panel. Some of them are not available at the beginning until you research proper Technology.
trans-unit.target: You can see available constructions in the Factory Items panel. Some of them are not available at the beginning until you research proper Technology.

trans-unit.source: Each Construction improves some attribute(s) of the planet. They also have a maintenance cost (Energy), so you must be careful with planning. If your planet does not have enough Energy, you will see a decrease in production.
trans-unit.target: Each Construction improves some attribute(s) of the planet. They also have a maintenance cost (Energy), so you must be careful with planning. If your planet does not have enough Energy, you will see a decrease in production.

trans-unit.source: Improve Earth by building constructions so it has at least 8 Food, 7 Energy and 14 Production.
trans-unit.target: Improve Earth by building constructions so it has at least 8 Food, 7 Energy and 14 Production.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to improve your planets.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to improve your planets.

trans-unit.source: If you don't need some construction, you can always remove it in the Constructions panel.
trans-unit.target: If you don't need some construction, you can always remove it in the Constructions panel.

trans-unit.source: Select planet Earth by left-clicking on the planet in the star system view or by pressing key 3.
trans-unit.target: Select planet Earth by left-clicking on the planet in the star system view or by pressing key 3.

trans-unit.source: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.
trans-unit.target: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.

trans-unit.source: Move the Builder outside of the range of the Defense Tower and build new Station.
trans-unit.target: Move the Builder outside of the range of the Defense Tower and build new Station.

trans-unit.source: Build a Defense Tower anywhere in your system.
trans-unit.target: Build a Defense Tower anywhere in your system.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to build the defense and protect your star systems. Defense is an important part of military strategy. There are two defensive units - Defense Towers and Stations. Only Builders can build them.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to build the defense and protect your star systems. Defense is an important part of military strategy. There are two defensive units - Defense Towers and Stations. Only Builders can build them.

trans-unit.source: If you select the Builder, you can see the range (red area) of the Defense Tower. You can't build another unit in this range except for a Miner.
trans-unit.target: If you select the Builder, you can see the range (red area) of the Defense Tower. You can't build another unit in this range except for a Miner.

trans-unit.source: The Station is the most powerful unit in the game, but it is really expensive. It has a docking area, where you can repair your starships. End of Tutorial...
trans-unit.target: The Station is the most powerful unit in the game, but it is really expensive. It has a docking area, where you can repair your starships. End of Tutorial...

trans-unit.source: The Defense Tower is a powerful stationary unit. It has a special unit action called Warp Magnet, which will pull any incoming starship to its location.
trans-unit.target: The Defense Tower is a powerful stationary unit. It has a special unit action called Warp Magnet, which will pull any incoming starship to its location.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is about the planet colonization.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is about the planet colonization.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to fight the enemy.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to fight the enemy.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to improve your planets by building constructions.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to improve your planets by building constructions.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to build your defense and protect your star systems.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to build your defense and protect your star systems.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to explore the galaxy and use unit actions.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to explore the galaxy and use unit actions.

trans-unit.source: Learn what rare resources are and how to use Miners to extract them from asteroids.
trans-unit.target: Learn what rare resources are and how to use Miners to extract them from asteroids.

trans-unit.source: Learn what Strike Groups are and how to form one.
trans-unit.target: Learn what Strike Groups are and how to form one.

trans-unit.source: This is not a tutorial. It's a testing scene for developers.
trans-unit.target: This is not a tutorial. It's a testing scene for developers.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to upgrade your units.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to upgrade your units.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you don't want to spend time manually exploring every system. In that case you can use the Auto Explore unit action. Try that on Scout One. You will see the unit takes a few turns before it enters the warp mode again.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes you don't want to spend time manually exploring every system. In that case you can use the Auto Explore unit action. Try that on Scout One. You will see the unit takes a few turns before it enters the warp mode again.

trans-unit.source: You have reached the destination. Use the Explore unit action on Scout One to enter the star system.
trans-unit.target: You have reached the destination. Use the Explore unit action on Scout One to enter the star system.

trans-unit.source: You can explore every field of the galaxy map, not just star systems. You can find rare artifacts, rogue planets or very dangerous black holes. Observe Scout One in the Galaxy view. Press the Back to Galaxy Map button.
trans-unit.target: You can explore every field of the galaxy map, not just star systems. You can find rare artifacts, rogue planets or very dangerous black holes. Observe Scout One in the Galaxy view. Press the Back to Galaxy Map button.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Exploration tutorial. This tutorial will teach you how to explore the galaxy and use unit actions. The galaxy in this tutorial has two star systems - Solar System and HD 10180. You cannot see details of HD 10180 because you have not explored it yet. You can only see the location of the star in the galaxy view and on the minimap.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the Exploration tutorial. This tutorial will teach you how to explore the galaxy and use unit actions. The galaxy in this tutorial has two star systems - Solar System and HD 10180. You cannot see details of HD 10180 because you have not explored it yet. You can only see the location of the star in the galaxy view and on the minimap.

trans-unit.source: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star the galaxy view.
trans-unit.target: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star the galaxy view.

trans-unit.source: Scout One is in the warp mode now, but remember each warp jump uses all your Warp Energy. It can take several turns to get that energy back. The amount of Warp Energy and Warp Energy Recharge time depends on the type of the unit.
trans-unit.target: Scout One is in the warp mode now, but remember each warp jump uses all your Warp Energy. It can take several turns to get that energy back. The amount of Warp Energy and Warp Energy Recharge time depends on the type of the unit.

trans-unit.source: You can move the unit in the warp mode by selecting the Move action or by holding the right mouse button and releasing it on the destination. Move the Scout One unit to the location of the HD 10180 star. It can take several turns to reach that location, so keep pressing the Next Turn button until the unit reaches the desired destination.
trans-unit.target: You can move the unit in the warp mode by selecting the Move action or by holding the right mouse button and releasing it on the destination. Move the Scout One unit to the location of the HD 10180 star. It can take several turns to reach that location, so keep pressing the Next Turn button until the unit reaches the desired destination.

trans-unit.source: You can see available unit actions for Scout One in the info panel. The most important action for exploration is the Warp Jump. Left-click on the icon to use it.
trans-unit.target: You can see available unit actions for Scout One in the info panel. The most important action for exploration is the Warp Jump. Left-click on the icon to use it.

trans-unit.source: Rare resources are on planets and asteroids. You get them if you colonize the planet or if you build a Miner to extract them from asteroids. You need a Builder for that.
trans-unit.target: Rare resources are on planets and asteroids. You get them if you colonize the planet or if you build a Miner to extract them from asteroids. You need a Builder for that.

trans-unit.source: Move the Builder closer to asteroids in the system and build a Miner there.
trans-unit.target: Move the Builder closer to asteroids in the system and build a Miner there.

trans-unit.source: You can start extracting resources now. Use the Extract Resources unit action.
trans-unit.target: You can start extracting resources now. Use the Extract Resources unit action.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to extract rare resources from asteroids and why you need them.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to extract rare resources from asteroids and why you need them.

trans-unit.source: The Miner is extracting resources now. That light blue area around the Miner is its range. You can get a bigger range by upgrading the Sensor Energy.
trans-unit.target: The Miner is extracting resources now. That light blue area around the Miner is its range. You can get a bigger range by upgrading the Sensor Energy.

trans-unit.source: There are 7 rare resources in the galaxy - Carbon, Helium, Hydrogen, Ferrum, Silicon, Titanium and Uranium. You need those resources to be able to build advanced starships or planet constructions. You can see your current amount in status bar.
trans-unit.target: There are 7 rare resources in the galaxy - Carbon, Helium, Hydrogen, Ferrum, Silicon, Titanium and Uranium. You need those resources to be able to build advanced starships or planet constructions. You can see your current amount in status bar.

trans-unit.source: Remember that rare resources are very important. Use Miners to extract them and don't forget to protect them. End of the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Remember that rare resources are very important. Use Miners to extract them and don't forget to protect them. End of the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: If you have units on the map, you can simply select any unit and right click on the other one. The selected unit will become a member of the Strike Group. Create your first Strike Group now.
trans-unit.target: If you have units on the map, you can simply select any unit and right click on the other one. The selected unit will become a member of the Strike Group. Create your first Strike Group now.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you about Strike Groups and how to form one. Strike Groups are an important tool for unit management.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you about Strike Groups and how to form one. Strike Groups are an important tool for unit management.

trans-unit.source: If you have units in orbit, you can form a group by selecting the members (CTRL + left click or SHIFT + left click) and press the Create Strike Group button. Create your second Strike Group now.
trans-unit.target: If you have units in orbit, you can form a group by selecting the members (CTRL + left click or SHIFT + left click) and press the Create Strike Group button. Create your second Strike Group now.

trans-unit.source: Strike Groups are a very important part of the unit management which can help you manage starships easily. Use them! End of the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Strike Groups are a very important part of the unit management which can help you manage starships easily. Use them! End of the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Strike Group is a group of your starships. The maximum is 7 units in one group. Instead of issuing orders to all your units, you can issue orders only to the leader. Group members will always stay in formation. There are more ways how to form a Strike Group.
trans-unit.target: Strike Group is a group of your starships. The maximum is 7 units in one group. Instead of issuing orders to all your units, you can issue orders only to the leader. Group members will always stay in formation. There are more ways how to form a Strike Group.

trans-unit.source: If you select any unit in a Strike Group, you can see a new UI panel. It gives you information about members and basic management actions.
trans-unit.target: If you select any unit in a Strike Group, you can see a new UI panel. It gives you information about members and basic management actions.

trans-unit.source: You can upgrade any unit in the game each new Rank (one upgrade per rank). Your unit gains experience each turn or for specific actions. Get the next Rank with the Scout by playing a few turns.
trans-unit.target: You can upgrade any unit in the game each new Rank (one upgrade per rank). Your unit gains experience each turn or for specific actions. Get the next Rank with the Scout by playing a few turns.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will teach you how to upgrade your units.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will teach you how to upgrade your units.

trans-unit.source: The Scout has been upgraded. Keep in mind some upgrades have a limited number of activations (per unit or per player).
trans-unit.target: The Scout has been upgraded. Keep in mind some upgrades have a limited number of activations (per unit or per player).

trans-unit.source: The Scout has a new rank. You can select an upgrade now. Select the Hull upgrade and press the Activate button.
trans-unit.target: The Scout has a new rank. You can select an upgrade now. Select the Hull upgrade and press the Activate button.

trans-unit.source: Not all upgrades are available at the beginning. You will have to research proper technology, and the upgrade itself has a minimal rank which has to be first achieved by the unit.
trans-unit.target: Not all upgrades are available at the beginning. You will have to research proper technology, and the upgrade itself has a minimal rank which has to be first achieved by the unit.

trans-unit.source: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.
trans-unit.target: Select the Solar System by left-clicking a star in the galaxy view.

trans-unit.source: Engines is the speed of a starship per turn.
trans-unit.target: Engines is the speed of a starship per turn.

trans-unit.source: Hull is the body of a starship. If it is equal or bellow zero a starship will explode.
trans-unit.target: Hull is the body of a starship. If it is equal or bellow zero a starship will explode.

trans-unit.source: Sensors give you higher range for scanning, extracting, shield recharging and attacking.
trans-unit.target: Sensors give you higher range for scanning, extracting, shield recharging and attacking.

trans-unit.source: Shields is a type of energy field around a starships. There are 6 directions. Shields protect against enemy attacks and do recharge every turn.
trans-unit.target: Shields is a type of energy field around a starships. There are 6 directions. Shields protect against enemy attacks and do recharge every turn.

trans-unit.source: Total Energy is the total value of an energy available for a starship's systems. More energy means better weapons, engines and sensors.
trans-unit.target: Total Energy is the total value of an energy available for a starship's systems. More energy means better weapons, engines and sensors.

trans-unit.source: Warp Energy gives you the ability to warp jump and mini warp jump, but only if it's fully charged.
trans-unit.target: Warp Energy gives you the ability to warp jump and mini warp jump, but only if it's fully charged.

trans-unit.source: Warp Speed is the speed of a starship per turn in galaxy (after warp jump).
trans-unit.target: Warp Speed is the speed of a starship per turn in galaxy (after warp jump).

trans-unit.source: Weapons is the military strength of a starships.
trans-unit.target: Weapons is the military strength of a starships.

trans-unit.source: Stronger hull for the ship. This Hull makes the ship more durable.
trans-unit.target: Stronger hull for the ship. This Hull makes the ship more durable.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Weapon Energy systems. This upgrade provides more firepower.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Weapon Energy systems. This upgrade provides more firepower.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Warp Recharge power. This upgrade provides faster warp energy recharge.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Warp Recharge power. This upgrade provides faster warp energy recharge.

trans-unit.source: Special hull coating makes the starship harder to destroy.
trans-unit.target: Special hull coating makes the starship harder to destroy.

trans-unit.source: Energy regulator provides more energy to the starship.
trans-unit.target: Energy regulator provides more energy to the starship.

trans-unit.source: Warp inductor makes the starship faster in warp.
trans-unit.target: Warp inductor makes the starship faster in warp.

trans-unit.source: Beam compressor provides more a hull damage power to weapons.
trans-unit.target: Beam compressor provides more a hull damage power to weapons.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides more energy to Weapons.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides more energy to Weapons.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides more energy to Shields.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides more energy to Shields.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides more energy to Engines.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides more energy to Engines.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides more energy to Sensors.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides more energy to Sensors.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides more a shield damage power to weapons.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides more a shield damage power to weapons.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides a faster recharge of the Warp Engine.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides a faster recharge of the Warp Engine.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Warp Speed. This upgrade provides faster movement in warp.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Warp Speed. This upgrade provides faster movement in warp.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Experience of the unit. This upgrade provides % XP.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Experience of the unit. This upgrade provides % XP.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade provides bonus to trade.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade provides bonus to trade.

trans-unit.source: Builder production upgrade. This upgrade provides bonus to production for faster building.
trans-unit.target: Builder production upgrade. This upgrade provides bonus to production for faster building.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Weapon Hull Damage. This upgrade provides higher damage to hull per Weapon Energy.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Weapon Hull Damage. This upgrade provides higher damage to hull per Weapon Energy.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Shield Energy systems. This upgrade provides stronger shields.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Shield Energy systems. This upgrade provides stronger shields.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Engine Energy systems. This upgrade provides faster movement per turn.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Engine Energy systems. This upgrade provides faster movement per turn.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Sensors Energy systems. This upgrade provides higher range for scanning, extracting, shield recharging and attacking.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Sensors Energy systems. This upgrade provides higher range for scanning, extracting, shield recharging and attacking.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Shields' Recharge power. This upgrade provides faster shields regeneration per turn.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Shields' Recharge power. This upgrade provides faster shields regeneration per turn.

trans-unit.source: Auto Repair on board systems. This upgrade auto repairs hull each turn.
trans-unit.target: Auto Repair on board systems. This upgrade auto repairs hull each turn.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Total Energy of the unit. This upgrade provides more energy to all systems.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Total Energy of the unit. This upgrade provides more energy to all systems.

trans-unit.source: Boost to Weapon Shields Damage. This upgrade provides higher damage to shields per Weapon Energy.
trans-unit.target: Boost to Weapon Shields Damage. This upgrade provides higher damage to shields per Weapon Energy.
